notes:
Removed the erroneous ' ' (space) character between the '-' and '0' characters. This makes the available characters for the HexBin 4.0 format more clear. In this reference file (https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/application/applefile) they presented it as such:

!"#$%&'()*+,-
012345689@ABCDEFGHIJKLMNPQRSTUVXYZ[`abcdefhijklmpqr
